item.title: [DELTA] ERROR 'got some things'[delta] ATLEAST TAKE A LOOK plz
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

[quote="_™, post:6, topic:285876"]“Though this is a “receive” error, one thing that could cause this problem to occur is what may be happening on the “sending” side. Sending two consecutive println statements to your output stream will [cause this error; I forgot to copy the rest].”

So yeah, check for double prints.[/quote]

Thnx anyways , but where to find client java?

Georgio or playerhanler

Read full topic

item.title: [DELTA] ERROR 'got some things'[delta] ATLEAST TAKE A LOOK plz
item.description:
@11167 wrote:

“Though this is a “receive” error, one thing that could cause this problem to occur is what may be happening on the “sending” side. Sending two consecutive println statements to your output stream will [cause this error; I forgot to copy the rest].”

So yeah, check for double prints.

item.title: [DELTA] ERROR 'got some things'[delta] ATLEAST TAKE A LOOK plz
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Hey there

look what error i get ;s

Exception encountered while parsing incoming packets from L 4 w l z. java.net.SocketException: Software caused connection abort: recv failed at java.net.SocketInputStream.socketRead0(Native Method) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at java.net.SocketInputStream.read(Unknown Source) at client.packetProcess(client.java:16641) at PlayerHandler.process(PlayerHandler.java:273) at process.run(process.java:16) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source) ClientHandler: Client L 4 w l z disconnected (dsl-hkimmlgw8-fee8f900-146.dhcp.inet.fi)

and in playerhandler.java line 273

there is [code]if (players[i].disconnected)
continue;

try {
players[ i ].preProcessing();
players[ i ].process();
int PacketLimit = 10;
while(players[ i ].packetProcess() && PacketLimit-- >= 0);
players[ i ].postProcessing();

players[i].getNextPlayerMovement();
} catch(Exception e) { players[ i ].disconnected = true; }
[/code]

THIS IS LINE 273; while(players[ i ].packetProcess() && PacketLimit-- >= 0);

Someone help atleast post somthing just a idea or so?

Georgio , thanks for reading

Read full topic
